description: Detects potentially suspicious child processes spawned by PowerShell
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Tim Shelton
false_positives: Some false positive is to be expected from PowerShell scripts that might make use of additional binaries such as "mshta", "bitsadmin", etc. Apply additional filters for those scripts when needed.
name: Potentially Suspicious PowerShell Child Processes
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:("*\\powershell_ise.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe") AND process.executable.text:("*\\bash.exe" OR "*\\bitsadmin.exe" OR "*\\certutil.exe" OR "*\\cscript.exe" OR "*\\forfiles.exe" OR "*\\hh.exe" OR "*\\mshta.exe" OR "*\\regsvr32.exe" OR "*\\rundll32.exe" OR "*\\schtasks.exe" OR "*\\scrcons.exe" OR "*\\scriptrunner.exe" OR "*\\sh.exe" OR "*\\wmic.exe" OR "*\\wscript.exe")) AND (NOT (process.parent.command_line.text:"*\\Program\ Files\\Amazon\\WorkspacesConfig\\Scripts\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\Program\ Files\\Amazon\\WorkspacesConfig\\Scripts\\*")))
